ValidationRule.description: Prevent Lead conversion if the Account status is Closed. Created for YODA
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $Setup.Bypass_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rules__c), ISCHANGED(StageName), TEXT(StageName) = 'Negotiate', OR ( ISPICKVAL(Account.Status__c, 'Closed'), ISPICKVAL(Account.Status__c, 'Pending'), ISPICKVAL(Account.Credit_Rating__c , 'Blocked') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An opportunity cannot move out of the "Propose / Quote" stage while the account's status is Pending or Closed or the credit rating is Blocked. Please reach out to sales operations.
